name: erth_battlebegins_01
text: Time to shake things up and see where they settle.
text_simple: time to shake things up and see where they settle
pretty_criteria: As the game starts|Spawning in the loadout

name: erth_firstblood_01
text: First Blood...and you had better get used to it.
text_simple: first blood and you had better get used to it

name: erth_move_09
text: The earth moves under my feet!
text_simple: the earth moves under my feet

name: erth_cast_04
text: The time you've all been waiting for.
text_simple: the time youve all been waiting for

name: erth_ability_fissure_03
text: They call me the Fissure Man!
text_simple: they call me the fissure man

name: erth_level_01
text: Stronger by an order of magnitude!
text_simple: stronger by an order of magnitude

name: erth_level_05
text: I'll shake them to their cores.
text_simple: ill shake them to their cores

name: erth_kill_08
text: It was your own damn fault.
text_simple: it was your own damn fault

name: erth_kill_11
text: Don't take that magnitude with me.
text_simple: dont take that magnitude with me

name: erth_rival_01
text: Tiny, your name is still too big for you.
text_simple: tiny your name is still too big for you

name: erth_rival_02
text: I broke you into little bits.
text_simple: i broke you into little bits

name: erth_rival_03
text: Was the soil too rocky to hold your roots?
text_simple: was the soil too rocky to hold your roots

name: erth_rival_04
text: You'll find no safe soil here.
text_simple: youll find no safe soil here

name: erth_rival_05
text: Who gave you permission to prance across the earth?
text_simple: who gave you permission to prance across the earth

name: erth_rival_06
text: No longer will your hooves dig into my hide.
text_simple: no longer will your hooves dig into my hide

name: erth_rival_07
text: This is no place for a mother.
text_simple: this is no place for a mother

name: erth_rival_08
text: Pick a different place to raise a family next time.
text_simple: pick a different place to raise a family next time

name: erth_rival_09
text: I'll not bow to you, Sand King, but I liked your style.
text_simple: ill not bow to you sand king but i liked your style

name: erth_rival_10
text: A shaken clock will soon stop ticking.
text_simple: a shaken clock will soon stop ticking

name: erth_rival_11
text: The only good clock is a stopped clock.
text_simple: the only good clock is a stopped clock

name: erth_rival_17
text: It was time to clear the underbrush.
text_simple: it was time to clear the underbrush

name: erth_rival_18
text: I didn't need a contract to hunt you down.
text_simple: i didnt need a contract to hunt you down

name: erth_rival_20
text: It was getting far too crowded.
text_simple: it was getting far too crowded

name: erth_rival_21
text: Phantom Lancer, I hate all of you.
text_simple: phantom lancer i hate all of you

name: erth_rival_23
text: Darkseer, you shouldn't be seen in such company.
text_simple: darkseer you shouldnt be seen in such company

name: erth_respawn_09
text: The Earth and I rise as one.
text_simple: the earth and i rise as one

name: erth_rare_01
text: Did the earth move for you too?
text_simple: did the earth move for you too

name: erth_rare_03
text: I miss my gargoyle friends back in Nishai. Everyone here is so soft.
text_simple: i miss my gargoyle friends back in nishai everyone here is so soft

name: erth_rare_04
text: Strange creatures, knights...hard shells, with a liquid center.
text_simple: strange creatures knights hard shells with a liquid center

name: erth_rare_05
text: There may be many earths, but there's only one Earthshaker.
text_simple: there may be many earths but theres only one earthshaker

name: erth_purch_01
text: I've been saving up for this.
text_simple: ive been saving up for this

name: erth_scepter_02
text: I'll give them such a pounding!
text_simple: ill give them such a pounding

name: erth_blink_04
text: From here to there in the blink of an eye...
text_simple: from here to there in the blink of an eye

name: erth_blink_05
text: In the blink of an eye...
text_simple: in the blink of an eye

name: erth_blink_06
text: Don't blink or you'll miss it!
text_simple: dont blink or youll miss it

text: The grave will have to wait.
